page.title: 13A SCHOOL DAY AT ABERNYTE
page.content: School starts at 9.00am and finishes at 3.15pm with one hour for dinner. Pupils start school at 5 years of age and leave at 12 years of age when they go to Harris Academy,Dundee or Perth High School 0.3 of the pupils walk to school 0.1 come by car.0.6 come on school transport("The Van").School transport is free.At school children learn maths language, environmental studies,art,PE, RE, health,music and crafts.Children travel to Perth weekly for 10 swimming sessions.The school is well equipped with disk drive,printer, computers,televisions, keyboard,sewing machine,piano and library along with lots of other things.As the school has 40 pupils on the roll space is limited. In 1985 Â£500 was spent on requistion for 1986.Dinners come from at Errol Dining Centre.A favourite dinner is curry.
